info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Chesterfield, east central Prince Edward, northern Nottoway, Amelia and southern Powhatan Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 958 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Macon to near Burkeville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Powhatan, Crewe, Mannboro, Moseley, Amelia Courthouse, Bon Air, Burkeville, Jetersville, Tobaccoville, Morven, Scotts Fork, Rice, Chula, Macon, Spainville, Ballsville, Earls, Ammon, Pilkinton and Winterham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
